
procedure foo();
begin
    a := 10000000000e-10000000000;
    a := 20000000000e-1000000000;
    a := 30000000000e-100000000;
    a := 40000000000e-10000000;
    a := 50000000000e-1000000;
    a := 60000000000e-100000;
    a := 70000000000e-10000;
    a := 80000000000e-1000;
    a := 90000000000e-100;
end
